Additional Plans

We found additional plans that may be yours. Please enter another Member ID for any other plans that you are enrolled in and click add a plan. If you do not have or want to register additional plans, just skip this step.

The Member ID you provided does not match the additional plans we found. Reenter your member ID or click "Next" to continue the registration process.

Additional plans associated with your member information are inactive or have been terminated and cannot be registered for online account access.

Questions?

UnitedHealthcare Customer Service representatives are available to assist you. Please call the number on the back of your plan member ID card during the listed hours of operation.
